alert.note: Alert for Bering Strait Coast; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 11 at 2:22PM AKST until November 12 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Moderate snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches, locally up to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph creating blowing snow reducing visibility down to 1/2 mile. * WHERE...Bering Strait Coast and Southern Seward Peninsula Coast. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to turn over to a rain and snow mix late Sunday afternoon or evening. This may reduce the amount of accumulated snowfall along the immediate coastlines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Bering Strait Coast; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast
